topics.body:
"@SidewardManatee":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/55ad4e19636872283f000232#post_55ad4e19636872283f000232
Here's my personal opinion: as someone that has been completely fucking insane to that level before as to hurt myself and do shit like that here's my honest to god opinion: just don't give a fuck and leave.  Most people that level of crazy do not care about getting better, nor do they want to nor do they have the strength to.

I know you're a good person, but not everyone who has that level of mental problems wants to get better.  It's really hard to overcome severe mental problems and from what you've told us she doesn't give a fuck about wanting to work it out so if you do try you're just going to get worn out from trying and eventually you're going to get frustrated and it will fuck up your life trying.

It sounds like a dick thing, but I've been there mentally and very rarely do people legitimately attempt or desire to work on their problems; not everyone wants to be metaphorically saved and not everyone wants to work it out; a fuck ton of people just when they get to that level just want to give up and they do give up and no matter how much you try to get them to care they don't care and just give up.

To put it another way for every person that gets through severe life crippling mental problems there's 9 others that just give up.


It sounds like a dick thing to say, but trust me if someone's like how you're describing then better that a psychologist tries than she screw up your life.  Just walk out the door and go "fuck it".
